title: Strategies for Weary Parents
itunes:author: Michael Anderson & Dr. Timothy Johanson
itunes:summary:
Motivating your child to do their chores or finish their schoolwork can leave you exhausted. John and Danny offer a simpler strategy for enforcing the rules. Featuring Michael Anderson and Dr. Timothy Johanson. Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/parentingpodcast. Or, call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

GIST: The Essence of Raising Life-Ready Kids: https://store.focusonthefamily.com/singleitem/checkout/donation/item/don-fofp-podcast-2020-09-01#refcd=998702

Get More Episode Resources: https://focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-parenting-podcast/strategies-for-weary-parents/#featured-resource-cta

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey
